channel.title: Can someone tell me how to change the crowns? for say like owner?
channel.description: Hey I was wondering can someone tell me in detail and were to go to change the crowns for say mod,admin,donator,owner i really need it please and also on how to make a custom yell? that stays? i dont want to keep going ::yell @gre@

item.title: Can someone tell me how to change the crowns? for say like owner?
item.dc:creator: @The_Provoked The Provoked
item.description:
@The_Provoked wrote:

If its a [317] then go into the client folder and select “files” folder then click on “spirts” and look for the crown you want to change.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone tell me how to change the crowns? for say like owner?

item.title: Can someone tell me how to change the crowns? for say like owner?
item.dc:creator: @_ZeroScape `ZeroScape
item.description:
@_ZeroScape wrote:

if (command.startsWith("yell")) { if (command.length() > 5) { yell(playerName + ": " + command.substring(5)); } }
Use that and explain me, I Vain I?
I wanna know

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone tell me how to change the crowns? for say like owner?
item.dc:creator: @kingtren kingtren
item.description:
@kingtren wrote:

Clients Cache. Look in sprites folder
Look for the crown and change that image to whatever you want it to be.
